thread.section_title: Adver-T Screen Printing and Embroidery Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Adver-T Screen Printing and Embroidery | advertscreenprinting.com
thread.title: Jeff
thread.title_full: Adver-T Screen Printing and Embroidery reviewed by Jeff

author: Jeff
title: Jeff
text: Everyone is very impressed with the quality of the t-shirt and hoodie we received from Adver T. We did the Tri Blend next level and they are extremely comfortable. We also did the next level hoodie. That has been a big hit too. Not to thick or thing and good quality. Plus the screen printing was dead on what it was suppose to look like.
